if statting.statting then statting:echo("Disabling statting triggers.
") statting.statting = false disableTrigger("Statting") statting:echo("Statting triggers disabled.

Alias.name: Statting container
Alias.script:
statting = statting or {}
statting.container = matches[2] statting:echo("Statting container set to ("..statting.container..")\n") enableTrigger("Statting_Lights")

Alias.name: Statting weapon
Alias.script:
statting = statting or {}
statting.weapon = matches[2] statting:echo("Statting weapon set to ("..statting.weapon..")\n") enableTrigger("Mend_Statting_Weapons")

Alias.name: Toggle autoconnect after disconnection
Alias.script:
statting.autoconnect = not statting.autoconnect statting:echo("You will now "..(statting.autoconnect and "<green>autoconnect<reset>" or "<red>not autoconnect<reset>").." to the game upon disconnection.
")
if statting.autoconnect then if not statting.name then statting:echo("Make sure the character name is also set ("statting name xxx").
", false, true) else statting:echo("Character name set to: "..statting.name.."
") end
if not statting.password then statting:echo("Make sure the character password is also set ("statting password xxx").
", false, true) else statting:echo("Character password set to: "..statting.password.."
") end
statting.reconnect_wait = statting.reconnect_wait or 5 statting:echo("The script will automatically attempt to reconnect after "..statting.reconnect_wait.." minutes.
") statting:echo("Set an alternate wait time (in minutes) with "statting reconnect xxx".
") end

Alias.name: Statting name
Alias.script:
statting.name = matches[2] statting:echo("Name set to: "..statting.name.."\n")
if not statting.password then statting:echo("Make sure the character password is also set (\"statting password xxx\").\n", false, true) end

Alias.name: Statting password
Alias.script:
statting.password = matches[2] statting:echo("Statting password set to: "..statting.password.."\n")
if not statting.name then statting:echo("Make sure the character name is also set (\"statting name xxx\").\n", false, true) end

Alias.name: Statting reconnection time
Alias.script:
statting.reconnect_wait = tonumber(matches[2]) statting:echo("Statting wait time for reconnection set to: "..statting.reconnect_wait.." minutes.
")
if not statting.name then statting:echo("Make sure the character name is also set ("statting name xxx").
", false, true) end
if not statting.password then statting:echo("Make sure the character password is also set ("statting password xxx").
", false, true) end
